arabic_text: الصلاة خير موضوع فمن استطاع ان يستكثر فليستكثر
english_text: Prayer is the best thing that has been laid down. So whoever is able to do much of it, let him do much.
chapter: This hadith emphasizes the paramount importance of prayer in Islam and encourages increasing voluntary prayers.

arabic_text: ما نقصت صدقة من مال وما زاد الله عبدا بعفو الا عزا
english_text: Charity does not decrease wealth, and Allah increases the honor of one who forgives, and no one humbles himself for the sake of Allah except that Allah elevates him.
chapter: This hadith teaches that giving charity actually increases one's wealth through Allah's blessings, and that forgiveness and humility lead to honor.

arabic_text: من صام رمضان ايمانا واحتسابا غفر له ما تقدم من ذنبه
english_text: Whoever fasts during Ramadan with faith and seeking reward, his previous sins will be forgiven.
chapter: This hadith explains the spiritual benefit of fasting in Ramadan when done with proper intention and faith.

arabic_text: الحج المبرور ليس له جزاء الا الجنة
english_text: An accepted Hajj has no reward except Paradise.
chapter: This hadith emphasizes the immense reward of performing Hajj properly and with sincerity.

english_text: Jihad (struggle in the way of Allah) will continue until the Day of Resurrection.
chapter: This hadith speaks about the continuous nature of striving in the way of Allah in various forms.
